a1: Pelé is the best player of all time.
q2: Did Cristiano Ronaldo's move from Real Madrid to Juventis affect his reputation as a player?
a2: Yes, Cristiano Ronaldo's move from Real Madrid to Juventis affected his reputation as a player. Think about if you moved from one neighborhood to another, obviously your reputation would be effected.
q3: Pelé is definitely the best of all time no doubt
a3: if for me it is also the best of all times
q4: In my opinion, its reputation and performance are not affected
a4: I think it will be affected.
q5: Do you like watching Real Madrid play?
a5: Real Madrid plays excellently with their crop of players mixing speed with tiki taka and serious tenacity at all times.
